page.title: 08SIMON'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: After school and at weekends I sometimes play on the park. My house overlooks Tonge Moor Park. It is 66, Parkdale Rd. In the summer there is a club on the park. Here you can play snooker and tabletennis. Sometimes a mini-bus takes us on a day outing to Blackpool. At weekends I often go to the leisure centre in town. I go there with a friend and we play squash, raquetball, football and badminton. Sometimes I go on outings with my family. We go to Rivington, Blackpool and Southport and we travel by car. When it's raining we stay inside and play on the computer with games, play snooker or watch television. When my mum and dad can get babysitters for me and my brothers they visit my auntie in Windermere. On Sundays we go to St. Augustine's Church in the morning. Mum goes to mass at night.
